snippet.title: Shadow Fight 2: Special Edition
snippet.description:
Shadow Fight 2 Special Edition is available on Android and iOS!
Android - https://goo.gl/awktMJ
iOS - https://goo.gl/1x9Xvs

Let's get to know a new paid standalone version of Shadow Fight 2. The Special Edition will expand the original game experience by worthwhile improvements:

- No limitation of energy!
- A whole new story chapter unveils the truth behind Sensei's past!
- No advertising!
- Numerous in-game enhancements, which will make it possible to fully enjoy the story mode.

Like, share and subscribe!

Also follow us on:
1. https://www.facebook.com/shadowfightgames
2. https://vk.com/shadowfightgames
3. https://twitter.com/ShadowFight_3

#ShadowFight2 #SpecialEdition
